entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Good Hope

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -23.6°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
